> Title:

Alignment of the V0 and the beam pipe support on the Front Absorber

> Date:

04.04.2007

> Subdetector:

V0

> Report URL:

https://edms.cern.ch/document/835615

> Version:

1

> General Observations:

V0 and the beam pipe flange are measured in several sessions and iterations.
Point names for session 0 in chapter 6.1 are given with prefix C61_0_
Point names for session 1 in chapter 6.2 are given with prefix C62_1_
Point names for session 2 in chapter 6.3 are given with prefix C63_2_
Point names for session 3 in chapter 6.4 are given with prefix C64_3_
Point names for session 4 in chapter 6.5 are given with prefix C65_4_
Point names for session 5 in chapter 6.6 are given with prefix C66_5_
Point names for session 6 in chapter 6.7 are given with prefix C67_6_
Point names for session 7, iteration 1 in chapter 6.8 are given with prefix C68_71_
Point names for session 7, iteration 2 in chapter 6.8 are given with prefix C68_72_
Point names for session 7, iteration 3 in chapter 6.8 are given with prefix C68_73_
Point names for session 8 in chapter 6.9 are given with prefix C69_8_
The center of Circle fitted through 5XXX points on beam pipe flange is called Beamcircle.
The center of Circle fitted through 6XXX points on V0 is called CenterV0.

> Coordinate System:

ALICEPH

> Units:

mm

> Nr Columns:

7

> Column Names:

Point Name,XPH,YPH,ZPH,Point Type,Target Used,Precision(mm)

> Data:
